metadata.title: CVE-2021-44858 mediawiki: information disclosure (important)
metadata.description:
DOCUMENTATION: A flaw was found in mediawiki. The "undo" feature (action=edit&undo=##&undoafter=###) allowed an attacker to view the contents of arbitrary revisions, regardless of whether they had permissions to do so. This was also found in the "mcrundo" and "mcrrestore" actions (action=mcrundo and action=mcrrestore). 
            STATEMENT: The mediawiki package was removed from OpenShift Container Platform (OCP) in version 4.3, therefore for OCP 4 has been marked as out of support scope.

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 9 is installed
mediawiki is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
